name: Nameless Gengorpa Game
description:
Created for the Moonmoon 2022 2nd Biannual game jam with the theme of Travesty.

Download and gameplay video will come later after Moonmoon plays.

Borpas created by various moonmoon community members and listed in the in game credits.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact/Choose action

Q- Go back
